document.full_text: republican mitt romney is set to outline a plan on thursday to repeal president barack obama's healthcare overhaul law in a move that seems aimed at blunting criticism by conservatives of a healthcare plan romney developed for massachusetts.
document.title: romney to take on healthcare law in speech
lines_and_colors: republican mitt romney is set to outline a plan on thursday to repeal president barack obama's healthcare overhaul law in a move that seems aimed at blunting criticism by conservatives of a healthcare plan romney developed for massachusetts.
